casebody.data:
Richard J. FREER
v.
Andrew CHIEN Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided December 14, 2017 Andrew Chien, self-represented, in support of the petition. Richard J. Freer, self-represented, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court (AC 40144) is denied.

MULLINS and KAHN, Js., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
